function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Individuals with symptoms not staying at home","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in the community.","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict guidelines for staying at home when experiencing symptoms, and providing support for those who need to self-isolate.","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps for symptom reporting and contact tracing.","People":"General public, individuals with symptoms.","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Large gatherings and public events","Impact":"Facilitate rapid spread of contagious diseases and make contact tracing and containment difficult.","Mitigation":"Enforcing bans on large gatherings, promoting virtual alternatives, and implementing strict hygiene and distancing protocols for essential events.","Technologies":"Virtual event platforms, contactless technology, and crowd monitoring systems.","People":"Event organizers, attendees, and community members.","Owner":"Public health authorities, event organizers, and local government."},{"Description":"Lack of social distancing and travel restrictions","Impact":"Increases the likelihood of community transmission and makes it challenging to contain the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Promoting and enforcing social distancing measures, travel restrictions, and providing education on the importance of these measures.","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, public transport monitoring, and communication tools for remote interactions.","People":"General public, travelers, and individuals in close contact.","Owner":"Government agencies, employers, and transportation authorities."}]}
